content: easy pattern for a cute summer tank top and it is very quick to make it is crocheted in one long piece and then buttoned together in the front the strap ties are made separately and sewed on at the end the pattern is easy to adjust for all sizes including kids and plus sizes i show directions for chest sizes 32 to 45 1/2 but again it is really easy to adjust it the finished length is 9 for all sizes but it can be made longer or shorter the pattern uses basic american crochet terminology and if you have experience with reading a written pattern this is a great pattern for a beginner skill level easy materials - medium weight cotton yarn - lion brand 24/7 cotton in ecru used in the picture - size g 4 mm crochet hook - 5 buttons
